casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ryan Gabriel GARCELL. No. 465A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 18, 2007. Thomas Maher, for Ryan Gabriel Garcell. Charlie C. Walker, Asheville, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Garcell) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of October 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of September 2007."
